job_title: Full Stack Software Engineer - Human Engineering
job_description:
• Minimum QualificationsStrong fundamentals in object-oriented programming, data structures, and algorithmsExpertise architecting and developing full stack web applications with RESTful APIs2+ years Python experienceWeb development experience with HTML5, CSS/SASS, and JavaScriptExperience with front-end frameworks such as Angular (preferred), React, or Vue.
• Experience with backend MVC frameworks such as Django (preferred), Rails, or SpringStrong understanding of relational database designExperience designing scalable software systemsDemonstrated UI/UX design abilitiesBS/MS in Computer Science/Engineering, or equivalent.

• The ideal candidate will have experience in Microchip firmware (MPLAB, Harmony), embedded Linux (ARM SoCs, Quartus), C++ GUI development with Qt, and networking (TCP/UDP).
• You'll translate customer needs into technical solutions and support project development end-to-end.
• Security clearance eligibility required (DoD preferred).
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to meet software engineering requirements.
